title: telugu tamiLa
sahitya:
telugu tamiLa sammiLita mainadE phalamaina samskrti I palukE tyAgarAja krti


anupallavi

  kaLala veluguku bhASA bhEdamu kaLankamaina hAni kaligincunu


caraNam    ArOgyamukai acArambulu Anandamukai AdhyAtmikamu 
aishvaryamukai Ishvara dhyAnamu bhUri guNamulaku muraLI gAnamu
